data.text: Dahi laangi hua, gei Samuel ga helekai gi Saul, “Ma ko au dela ne hagau mai go Dimaadua bolo au gi hagatulu ina goe e hai di king o ana daangada Israel. Malaa, goe gi hagalongo gi nia helekai mai baahi o Dimaadua di Gowaa Aamua.15.1 1 Samuel 10.1
Mee ga daaligi digau Amalek, idimaa, digaula nogo hai baahi ang gi digau Israel i di nadau lloomoi i Egypt.15.2 Exodus 17.8-14; Deuteronomy 25.17-19

Deenei laa, goe hana, heebagi gi digau Amalek, daaligidia gi daha nadau mee huogodoo ala i nadau baahi, nia daane, ahina, damagiigi, mo nia dama lligi, nadau kau, siibi, ‘camel’ mono ‘donkey’. Heia huogodoo gii mmaa gi daha.”
Saul ga haga dagabuli mai ana gau dauwa gi Telem, ga hagadina digaula i golo bolo e lua lau mana (200,000) mai i Israel ge e madangaholu mana (10,000) mai i Judah.
Saul mo ana gau dauwa gaa hula gi di waahale go Amalek, gaa noho hagammuni i lodo di monowai bagu, gaa tali digaula i golo.

Saul ga helekai gi digau Kenite, “Goodou hula gi daha mo digau Amalek, gi de daaligi hua goodou dalia digaula, idimaa, goodou nogo humalia ang gi digau Israel i di nadau loomoi i Egypt.” Gei digau Kenite gaa hula gi daha mo digau Amalek.
Saul ga daaligi digau huogodoo o Amalek ala i Havilah gaa dau adu loo gi Shur i baahi gi dua o Egypt.
Mee gaa kumi Agag di king o Amalek digi daaligidia, gei digau ala i golo la gu dadaaligi huogodoo gi mmademmade.

Saul mo ana gau dauwa digi daaligidia di king go Agag, mo nia siibi mono kau ala koia e humalia, nia siibi lligi mono kau lligi, mo nia mee huogodoo ala koia e humalia. Gei nia mee ala hagalee hagalabagau la gu haga mmaa huogodoo gi daha.
Dimaadua ga helekai gi Samuel,

“Au gu tilikai hualaa i dagu dugu a Saul belee hai di king. Mee gu huli hua gi daha gu de hagalongo gi agu haganoho.” Samuel gu huaidu huoloo ono lodo, malaa, di boo dogomaalia deelaa gei Samuel e hai ana dangidangi ang gi Dimaadua.

Hooaga dono luada, gei Samuel gaa hana ga halahala a Saul, gaa longo bolo Saul la guu hana gi di waahale go Carmel, e haga duu aga dana haga langahia ang gi deia i golo, gei nomuli gei mee guu hana gi Gilgal.
Samuel gaa dau adu loo gi baahi o mee, gei Saul ga heetugi gi mee ga helekai, “Dimaadua gi hagahumalia ina goe, Samuel. Au guu hai gii hai be nnelekai Dimaadua.”
Samuel ga heeu, “Gei di maa di aha dela e hagalongo ginai au be nia lee kau mo nia lee siibi?”

Saul ga helekai gi mee, “Nia mee hua ni agu gau dauwa ala ne gaamai i baahi o digau Amalek. Digaula ne hili go nia mee ala koia e humalia huoloo i baahi nia siibi mono kau bolo e gaamai e haihai nia tigidaumaha ang gi Dimaadua go doo God, gei nia mee huogodoo ala i golo la gu haga mmaa huogodoo gi daha.”
Samuel ga helekai, “Guu lawa. Dolomeenei gei au ga hagi adu gi di goe di mee a Dimaadua dela ne hagi mai gi di au anaboo.”

Samuel ga helekai, “Saul, ma e aha maa goe e hai bolo goe tangada mugi lala loo, gei goe guu hai tangada dela e dagi nia madawaawa Israel dolomeenei. Ma go Dimaadua dela ne hagatulu goe belee hai di king o Israel,
ga hagau goe bolo goe gii hana gi haga mmaa ina gi daha digau huaidu huogodoo o Amalek, bolo goe gi heebagi digaula, gi haga mmaa ina digaula huogodoo gi daha.
Malaa, goe ne aha dela digi hagalongo gi Mee? Goe ne aha dela ga limalima gaa kae nia goloo o hagadaumee, ga haga manawa gee Dimaadua?”
Saul ga helekai gi Samuel, “Au gu hagalongo gi Dimaadua. Au guu hai gii hai be ana helekai, ga laha mai di king go Agag, gei gu daaligi digau huogodoo ala i golo.
Gei agu gau dauwa digi daaligidia nia siibi mono kau ala e kaedahi e humalia, ala ne kumi go digaula belee gaamai gi Gilgal belee hai ai nia tigidaumaha ang gi Dimaadua go doo God.”

Samuel ga helekai gi mee, “Dehee di mee dela e hiihai ginai a Dimaadua: di hagalongo be go di tigidaumaha? Malaa, go di hagalongo deelaa di mee koia e humalia i di tigidaumaha dela ma gaa hai gi nia siibi ala e kaedahi e humalia.15.22 Pisalem 40.6-8; Isaiah 1.11-15; Hosea 6.6; Micah 6.6-8; Mark 12.33

Di hai baahi gi Mee la koia e huaidu huoloo, gadoo be di hai buubuu. Di hagamuamua le e hai gadoo be di huaidu o di hai daumaha gi nia balu ieidu. Idimaa i do haga balumee nnelekai Dimaadua, gei Mee hogi guu daa goe gi daha mo do waawa king.”
Saul ga helekai gi mee, “Au gu de hagalongo gi nnelekai Dimaadua mo au helekai. Ko au hua ne madagu i agu daangada, gaa dugu ang gi digaula gi heia nadau hiihai.
Dolomeenei, gei au e dangi adu gi di goe dumaalia mai ogu huaidu, gei goe hana madalia au gi Gilgal gii mee au di madalia goe e daumaha ang gi Dimaadua.”
Samuel ga helekai, “Au hagalee hana madalia goe. Goe dela gu de hagalongo gi nnelekai Dimaadua, gei Mee guu daa goe gi daha mo do waawa king o Israel.”
Samuel gaa huli bolo ia gaa hana, gei Saul ga kumi adu di gahu laa daha o maa, gei di gahu la gu mahaa.
Samuel ga helekai gi Saul, “Dimaadua la gu haahi goe gi daha mo Israel dangi nei, gaa wanga gi dahi dangada dela koia e humalia i di goe.15.28 1 Samuel 28.17; 1 Kings 11.30-31
Di God aamua o Israel la hagalee di God hai kai tilikai be e huli dono manawa. Mee hagalee tangada bolo gaa mee laa di lui dono manawa.”15.29 James 1.17

Saul ga helekai gi mee, “Au gu ihala huoloo, gei goe gi heia au gi aamua i mua nia golomada o digau aamua o agu daangada, mo i mua nia golomada o digau Israel. Goe gii hana i ogu muli gii mee ai dagu hai daumaha ang gi Dimaadua dela go doo God.”
Malaa, Samuel gaa hana madalia a mee gi Gilgal, gei Saul ga daumaha ang gi Dimaadua.

Samuel ga helekai, “Laha mai di king go Agag gi ogu mua.” Agag ga dagi mai gi mua o Samuel, e bolebole huoloo i dono madagu, e hagabaubau ang gi deia boloo, “Di made la di mee haga manawa gee huoloo!”

Gei Samuel ga helekai gi mee, “I di hai o dau hulumanu dauwa deenaa dela ne hai nia dinana gi deai nadau dama ai, deenei gadoo di hai dela gaa hai hogi gi do dinana gi deai dana dama ai.” Samuel ga daaligi a mee gii made i mua di gowaa dudu tigidaumaha dela i Gilgal.
Nomuli, gei Samuel ga hagatanga gaa hana gi Ramah, gei Saul gaa hana gi dono guongo i Gibeah.
Samuel digi heetugi loo gi Saul i di waalooloo o dono mouli, e noho gei e lodo huaidu huoloo i Saul. Gei Dimaadua gu tilikai hualaa gi dana haga noho a Saul gii hai di king o Israel.
